summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented by adding a new profile/user settings button in the desktop left rail (ServerRail) that opens the existing User Settings overlay via navigation state. The diff also introduces meta/project tracking updates not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated internal project tracking entries (new_feature_requests AR-1/AR-2) unrelated to implementing the UI button behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a UI change (profile settings button). It does not request updating project_state.json or adding tracking items.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated a generated documentation/summary file describing many frontend files (including unrelated backend/query changes) beyond the requested UI change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating documentation/summary artifacts; this file includes broad descriptions not required for REQ-1.
